tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Agroforestry_Research_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(100),
  tree_height FLOAT,
  biodiversity_index INTEGER,
  ecosystem_service VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE biodiversity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    forest_id INT,
    date DATE,
    biodiversity_index FLOAT,
    ecosystem_services TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES Biodiversity(species_id),
  service_id INT REFERENCES EcosystemServices(service_id),
  research_description TEXT,
  research_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE biodiversity_research_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    biodiversity_index FLOAT,
    ecosystem_services TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    land_use VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    measurement_type VARCHAR(255),
    measurement_value FLOAT
);
